title: Healthy Avocado Egg Salad and Salmon Sandwich
directions: Combine the egg yolks with the avocado, light mayo, mustard, brine from capers if using, chives, salt and pepper. Mash with a fork. Chop the egg whites and add to yolks; adjust salt and pepper as needed.
To assemble, place 1 oz lox on each slice of bread, top with cucumber and divide egg salad between toasts.
ingredients: 2 large hard boiled egg whites (discard the rest)
1/2 (2 oz) medium hass avocado, cut into 1/2-inch dice
1/2 tbsp finely chopped fresh chives or dill
4 slices whole grain sliced bread, toasted
